channel.title: CVE Feed for Omron -- CX-Programmer within CX-One
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Omron -- CX-Programmer within CX-One

item.title: CVE-2019-6556|2024-08-04T20:23:22.210Z -- omron -- cx-programmer%20within%20cx-one
item.description: When processing project files, the application (Omron CX-Programmer v9.70 and prior and Common Components January 2019 and prior) fails to check if it is referencing freed memory. An attacker could use a specially crafted project file to exploit and execute code under the privileges of the application.
